verses.verse: <S%H7725>Again<s%> I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H702>behold,<s%> four <S%H4818>chariots<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> from between <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H1261>dappled<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> all of them <S%H554>powerful.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>asked<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H113>me,<s%> "What are these, my lord?"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H702>me,<s%> "These are the four <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> which go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H3320>standing<s%> before the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The one with the <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> goes <S%H3318>out<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country;<s%> and the <S%H3836>white<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1261>them;<s%> and the dappled went <S%H3318>forth<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>"

The <S%H554>strong<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> that they might walk back and <S%H1980>forth<s%> through the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> <S%H1980>around<s%> and through the <S%H776>earth!<s%>" So they walked back and <S%H1980>forth<s%> through the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Then he <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H853>to<s%> <S%H1696>me,<s%> and spoke to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> those who <S%H3318>go<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> have <S%H5117>quieted<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>"

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> of them of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> even of <S%H2469>Heldai,<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobijah,<s%> and of <S%H3048>Jedaiah;<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> the same <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah,<s%> where they have <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H3947>Yes,<s%> take <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5850>crowns,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> them on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H376>"Behold,<s%> the man whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H6780>Branch:<s%> and he shall grow <S%H6779>up<s%> out of his <S%H1129>place;<s%> and he shall build the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

even he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H1935>glory,<s%> and shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H4910>rule<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne;<s%> and he shall be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne;<s%> and the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> shall be between them <S%H8147>both.<s%>

The <S%H5850>crowns<s%> shall be to <S%H2494>Helem,<s%> and to <S%H2900>Tobijah,<s%> and to <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> and to <S%H2581>Hen<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah,<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Those who are far <S%H7350>off<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H8085>you.<s%> This will happen, if you will diligently <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>"'"
